Reviews.Title: “Search for a better hotel”
Reviews.Author: Micha84
Reviews.Content: For the value you could probably find a better hotel. The paint on the walls in the room and the corridor was old. The wardrobe was broken. The view from the balcony was nice and the location is great in Taxim square but other than that there was no advantage in staying there. The breakfast did not have alot of varities and the food did not taste good.

Reviews.Title: “good value, great location”
Reviews.Author: diz23
Reviews.Content: Stayed here a few times, both for business and pleasure. Its decent value, and a great location, just off taksim square, and 1 minute to Istiklal st (the Oxford st of Eurpoean Istanbul). Take the Havas bus from the airport to Taksim (9 lira, pay on the bus) and just walk across taksim to find the hotel. Its a little tired looking and old fashioned, certainly no boutique hotel! but if youre just looking for some where decent to sleep then its fine. The breakfast is ok, nothing special, missing it is not a big deal, but the cafe across the road makes a very good fresh orange juice! there is free internet in the lobby, and the staff have always been very helpful. I stay here due to location and price, but feel safe, looked after and its clean. After a late night in the bars around Beyoglu, the hotel is a 10- 15 mins walk home, and the area is safe, especially as you can walk straight up Istiklal st to ge to the hotel, and this st is always busy. Aslo, catch a bus to anywhere from here, or take the metro.
